Race.SpecificTitle: PW-Ambulance Serv. Dist. -- 6 Mills - BOC - 10 Yrs.
Race.SummaryText:
Parishwide Proposition
(Ambulance Service District) 

Summary:  10 year, 6 mill property tax for paying the cost of providing ambulance service in DeSoto Parish Ambulance Service District, said tax to replace, starting in the year 2009, a 4 mill tax authorized to be levied pursuant to an election held on November 7, 2000.
Race.FullText: Shall DeSoto Parish Ambulance Service District, State of Louisiana (the "District") levy a six (6) mills tax (the "Tax") on all the property subject to taxation within the District for a period of ten (10) years, beginning with the year 2009 and ending with the year 2018 (an estimated $1,420,000 reasonably expected at this time to be collected from the levy of the tax for an entire year), for the purpose of paying the cost of providing ambulance service in the District, said Tax to replace, starting in the year 2009, a four (4) mills tax authorized to be levied through the year 2010 for such purposes pursuant to an election held on November 7, 2000?
